attributes.action: bring in a law requiring all pubs and club's to use metal detecting equipment on there door's
attributes.additional_details: We need to bring in to effect a law ensuring that people are not victims of senseless violence  whilst on a night out with friend's ,where individuals  are not  able to enter a pub or club or any venue serving Alcohol where people are enjoying a night out and because these individuals enter the premises carrying knives and other dangerous weapons with the intention to use it and subsequently end another person's life and wrecking the lives of everyone related and connected to the person that they have mindlessly killed with the weapon  , we cannot let this continue ...please sign this petition in memory and respect of a young life lost and his loved ones who are greatly grieving for thier loved one who sadly was a victim of senseless knife crime on march 15th 2015 aged just 18 years old , metal detecting systems should be a necessary measure as it is in a court of law and if this was already law , Daniel would still be with us !!!,

rejection.details: This is a matter for each individual local licensing authority, in consultation with the police.
